0.kek: Xkomon esil chi rix li kaqi yajel

2.kek:

8.spa:
Adapted from original copy 'Learn about the coronavirus, coloring book'
by St. Jude Children's Research Hospital
https://together.stjude.org

11.kek: Maare ak xawab'i naab'al li poyanam chi aatinak chi rix li kaqi yajel. A'an jun li yajel naruuk naketok aawe.

12.kek:
Junqaq poyanam nake' xye COVI-19 re



A'an li junjunq chi tz'iib' nak'utb'esink re xk'ab'a' li kaqi yajel

14.kek: Li kaqi yajel a'an jun li aatin xchalk rik'in li aatin "Corona" sa' kaxlan aatin, sa' xk'ab'a' naq nake'ril li k'anjelob'aal re ilok mitz' aj xul kama' ta wi' chik jun li punit.

16.kek: Naab'al chi poyanam sa' chi xjunil li ruuchich'och' xe'yajerk. Sa' xk'ab'a' naq li kaqi yajel jwal sa naq taataw rik'in junaq chik li poyanam.

18.kek:
Li kaqi yajel nab'eek chi ru li iq' sa' jun paat naq na'at'ism'ak junaq.

Jo' aj wi' nanume'k naq junaq li poyanam naxch'e' k'a' ru aq.

21.kek:
Li poyanam li nake'tawe'k xb'aan li yajel naxk'e xtiqeb', naruuk nake'reek'a naq yo li xtiqeb', nake' ta'e' xb'aan li ojb'il, naru naxk'e xmay xsa'eb' malaj inka' chik jwal sa nake'musiq'ak.

Chi xjunil li poyanam nake' yajer naru NAKE'K'IRAAK CHI JUN PAAT.

Kama' b'ayaq naq yooq aatiq malaj aake.

24.kek:
Wankeb' li poyanam jwal kaw nake'k'anjelak

Re naq chi xjunil te'xkol rib' ut kawaqeb'.

Eb' laj k'anjel chi rix li kawilal, yookeb' xyalb'al xq'e chi rix li kaqi yajel.  Yookeb' xkawresinkil li na'ajej choq' reheb' li poyanam te'yajeerq.

Ab'an wan ajwi' li na'leb' b'ar wi' naru nakoo'okenk wi' laa'o re naq ink'a' tpukanq li kaqi yajel.

Wi' laa'o tqakol qib', nakootenq'ank re naq ink'a'  tapukanq li yajel a'in.

26.kek: Jwal aajel ru naq taach'aj laawuq'b' chi kok' xsa'.

28.kek: Joq'e naruuk taach'aj laawuq'b' rik'in xab'on

30.kek:
Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq taach'e' xnaq' laawu, sa' laawu ut laawu'uj.

Ch'aj laawuq' naq ok aawe chi wa'ak.

Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq tat-elq chaq sa' junaq na'ajej b'ar wi' yo'on wi' poyanam.

Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq tat-elq chaq sa' li tz'eqleb'aal ib'.

32.kek:
Na'leb' li taab'aanu re xkolb'al aawib' chi ru li kaqi yajel:

1. Ch'aj aawuq'b' rik'in chaab'il ha'.

2. Ojb'an malaj at'isb'an rik'in junaq t'ikr malaj hu.

3. Maach'e' xnaq' laawu, sa' laawe malaj laawu'uj.

4. Anaqwank maach'e' chik jalan poyanam.

5. Ma'atchik sa' li na'ajej b'ar wi' yo'oneb' li poyanam.

6. Wanqat sa' ochoch, kawaqat ut taakol aawib'.

34.kek: Juunq'aq li poyanam jwal nake'xik xch'ool rik'in li jalaak xwank xb'aan li yajel a'in. Naruu naq xb'aan li qak'a'uxl naruuk nakooyajerk.

36.kek:
Wi' yook aaxiw jwal us taawotz li k'a' ru nakaweek'a.

Wi' wank aapatz'om...

Maare yook aatiq chi jwal kaw, malaj xrahil saakux, malaj ink'a' sa nakatmusiq'ak.

Boq'on sa' li ajl a'in: 1800 200

39.kek: Joq'e naruuk taach'aj laawuq'b' rik'in li xab'on?

41.kek: Naq taach'e' junaq li k'a' aq ree ru

47.kek: K'a' ru naruuk xb'aanunkil re xkolb'al qib' chi ru li kaqi yajel

50.kek: Xch'aj'b'al li quq' chi kok' sa'

bookText.kek:
Xkomon esil chi rix li kaqi yajel

Xjolomil li Tzolok re Watemaal
Xna'il Xjolomil li Tzolok sa' Ka'paay chi Aatinob'aal

Xkomon esil chi rix li kaqi yajel




978-9929-794-28-3

Maare ak xawab'i naab'al li poyanam chi aatinak chi rix li kaqi yajel. A'an jun li yajel naruuk naketok aawe.
Junqaq poyanam nake' xye COVI-19 re



A'an li junjunq chi tz'iib' nak'utb'esink re xk'ab'a' li kaqi yajel

Li kaqi yajel a'an jun li aatin xchalk rik'in li aatin "Corona" sa' kaxlan aatin, sa' xk'ab'a' naq nake'ril li k'anjelob'aal re ilok mitz' aj xul kama' ta wi' chik jun li punit.

Naab'al chi poyanam sa' chi xjunil li ruuchich'och' xe'yajerk. Sa' xk'ab'a' naq li kaqi yajel jwal sa naq taataw rik'in junaq chik li poyanam.

Li kaqi yajel nab'eek chi ru li iq' sa' jun paat naq na'at'ism'ak junaq.

Jo' aj wi' nanume'k naq junaq li poyanam naxch'e' k'a' ru aq.






Li poyanam li nake'tawe'k xb'aan li yajel naxk'e xtiqeb', naruuk nake'reek'a naq yo li xtiqeb', nake' ta'e' xb'aan li ojb'il, naru naxk'e xmay xsa'eb' malaj inka' chik jwal sa nake'musiq'ak.

Chi xjunil li poyanam nake' yajer naru NAKE'K'IRAAK CHI JUN PAAT.

Kama' b'ayaq naq yooq aatiq malaj aake.


Wankeb' li poyanam jwal kaw nake'k'anjelak

Re naq chi xjunil te'xkol rib' ut kawaqeb'.

Eb' laj k'anjel chi rix li kawilal, yookeb' xyalb'al xq'e chi rix li kaqi yajel.  Yookeb' xkawresinkil li na'ajej choq' reheb' li poyanam te'yajeerq.

Ab'an wan ajwi' li na'leb' b'ar wi' naru nakoo'okenk wi' laa'o re naq ink'a' tpukanq li kaqi yajel.

Wi' laa'o tqakol qib', nakootenq'ank re naq ink'a'  tapukanq li yajel a'in.

Jwal aajel ru naq taach'aj laawuq'b' chi kok' xsa'.

Joq'e naruuk taach'aj laawuq'b' rik'in xab'on

Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq taach'e' xnaq' laawu, sa' laawu ut laawu'uj.

Ch'aj laawuq' naq ok aawe chi wa'ak.

Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq tat-elq chaq sa' junaq na'ajej b'ar wi' yo'on wi' poyanam.

Ch'aj laawuq'b' naq tat-elq chaq sa' li tz'eqleb'aal ib'.


Na'leb' li taab'aanu re xkolb'al aawib' chi ru li kaqi yajel:

1. Ch'aj aawuq'b' rik'in chaab'il ha'.

2. Ojb'an malaj at'isb'an rik'in junaq t'ikr malaj hu.

3. Maach'e' xnaq' laawu, sa' laawe malaj laawu'uj.

4. Anaqwank maach'e' chik jalan poyanam.

5. Ma'atchik sa' li na'ajej b'ar wi' yo'oneb' li poyanam.

6. Wanqat sa' ochoch, kawaqat ut taakol aawib'.

Juunq'aq li poyanam jwal nake'xik xch'ool rik'in li jalaak xwank xb'aan li yajel a'in. Naruu naq xb'aan li qak'a'uxl naruuk nakooyajerk.

Wi' yook aaxiw jwal us taawotz li k'a' ru nakaweek'a.

Wi' wank aapatz'om...

Maare yook aatiq chi jwal kaw, malaj xrahil saakux, malaj ink'a' sa nakatmusiq'ak.

Boq'on sa' li ajl a'in: 1800 200

Il ma xaataw ru
Joq'e naruuk taach'aj laawuq'b' rik'in li xab'on?
Naq tat ajq
Naq taach'e' junaq li k'a' aq ree ru
Naq tat se'eq



Il ma xaataw ru
K'a' ru naruuk xb'aanunkil re xkolb'al qib' chi ru li kaqi yajel
Xik sa' nimq'e
Eelelik
Xch'aj'b'al li quq' chi kok' sa'
